name: Triangle Shooter: The Invaders
storyline: In the near future, the Earth was in crisis due to the alien invasion. The Allied forces have created "Triangle" using extraterrestrial technology that they have collected and researched for many years. You are the last hope of humanity as a pilot of "Triangle".
summary: Triangle Shooter: The Invaders is a side-scrolling shooter game that can move freely from side to side. You have to perform various missions around the world.
